description: Detects the load of the vulnerable Dell BIOS update driver as reported in CVE-2021-21551
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: Legitimate BIOS driver updates (should be rare)
name: Vulnerable Dell BIOS Update Driver Load
query: ((dll.path:*\\DBUtil_2_3.Sys*) OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*SHA256\=0296E2CE999E67C76352613A718E11516FE1B0EFC3FFDB8918FC999DD76A73A5* OR *SHA256\=DDBF5ECCA5C8086AFDE1FB4F551E9E6400E94F4428FE7FB5559DA5CFFA654CC1* OR *SHA1\=C948AE14761095E4D76B55D9DE86412258BE7AFD* OR *SHA1\=10B30BDEE43B3A2EC4AA63375577ADE650269D25* OR *MD5\=C996D7971C49252C582171D9380360F2* OR *MD5\=D2FD132AB7BBC6BBB87A84F026FA0244*)) OR (sha256:("0296e2ce999e67c76352613a718e11516fe1b0efc3ffdb8918fc999dd76a73a5" OR "ddbf5ecca5c8086afde1fb4f551e9e6400e94f4428fe7fb5559da5cffa654cc1")) OR (sha1:("c948ae14761095e4d76b55d9de86412258be7afd" OR "10b30bdee43b3a2ec4aa63375577ade650269d25")) OR (md5:("c996d7971c49252c582171d9380360f2" OR "d2fd132ab7bbc6bbb87a84f026fa0244")))
